StringTable.Label: FACTION_DLC_DREADLORDS_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: Pirate forces are decentralized and brutal. They do not have the resources of most races, so are slow to build forces, but in time can become a powerful threat if left unchecked.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_DLC_PEACEKEEPERS_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: Pirate forces are decentralized and brutal. They do not have the resources of most races, so are slow to build forces, but in time can become a powerful threat if left unchecked.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_DLC_SPACEMONSTERS_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: Pirate forces are decentralized and brutal. They do not have the resources of most races, so are slow to build forces, but in time can become a powerful threat if left unchecked.

StringTable.Label: MINOR_BRAINY'AK_Dec
StringTable.String: An ancient civilization that has spent the last millennia focusing on technology, Now that they have been exposed to the broader galactic community, the Brainy'ak find them self's unable to compete militaristically, and try and maintain their sovereignty though the trade of their precious technologies.
